This is a complete set of game creation tools consisting of a sprite and level editor and simple music composer.  There are a variety of special effects for such things as power ups, transporters, switches and particle emitters.  You can make games in a number of genres tho some are better supported than others.  (RPG and top view seem like afterthought add ons.)  Quite a few of the new genres have been added since I've bought the app, and the developer has been pretty quick to address most bugs--tho some folks seem to have serious issues with large complicated games on some hardware.  What you CAN NOT do is export games as a .apk for upload on the Play Store or any other android apps site, but there is an associated site where games and sprites can be uploaded and downloaded and rated.  All in all, this is the best game creation software--out of a very small collection--available for the Android platform.  At least, that I know of--and I've looked long and hard--available for the android platform.  If you're more interested in 3d fps type games, there is a similar product by the same vendor.
